title: Cavolo nero, Romano pepper, Quorn sausage & mozzarella frittata

ingredients.item: 6 Waitrose British Blacktail Medium Free Range Eggs
100g essential Waitrose Italian Lighter Mozzarella, coarsely grated
240g pack 4 Quorn Best Of British Sausages, sliced

instructions.step: Preheat the grill to high. In a bowl, beat together the eggs, milk and mozzarella. Season and set aside.

Warm a medium-sized ovenproof frying pan over a high heat. Add the Quorn sausages and cook for 2 minutes, turning until browned then remove from the pan. Add the oil and saut√© the cavolo nero, peppers and onions for 3-4 minutes, until soft. Return the sausage to the pan. Reduce the heat to low and fold in the egg mixture until well combined. Cook gently, without stirring, for 6 minutes, until bubbling.
Place under the grill for 5 minutes until golden. Remove and leave to rest for 3 minutes before serving cut into wedges. Delicious with a tomato salad.
